summary:
(Please excuse the bad English.)
This replaces the gold (obviously) with a Norwegian 20 Kr coin, it\'s supposed to look old and used.
Because Skyrim is essentially a Norway simulator anyway.
(Yes, there are dragons in Norway, and yes I know I suck at bumpmaps.)
I may do some other coins, if you want me to.

It\'s supposed to look old and used
descriptionHtml:
(Please excuse the bad English.)
This replaces the gold (obviously) with a Norwegian 20 Kr coin, it\'s supposed to look old and used.

author: Sweet Tooth
